original_text: I am sure of this. Nothing can stop God from loving us. Death cannot do that. Life cannot do that. Angels cannot do that, nor can demons do that. Nothing that happens to us now, or that will happen in a future time can do that. No powerful spirits can do that. Nothing that is high above the world can do that, nor anything that is deep down below the ground. Nothing else in the whole universe can stop God from loving us. Because of our Lord Christ Jesus, we know how much God loves us. I am sure of this. Nothing can stop God from loving us. Death cannot do that. Life cannot do that. Angels cannot do that, nor can demons do that. Nothing that happens to us now, or that will happen in a future time can do that. No powerful spirits can do that. Nothing that is high above the world can do that, nor anything that is deep down below the ground. Nothing else in the whole universe can stop God from loving us. Because of our Lord Christ Jesus, we know how much God loves us.
korean_text: 높음이나 깊음이나 다른 어떤 피조물이라도 우리를 우리 주 그리스도 예수 안에 있는 하나님의 사랑에서 끊을 수 없으리라

sentences.original_text: I am sure of this.
Nothing can stop God from loving us.
sentences.korean_translation: 아무것도 하나님이 우리를 사랑하시는 것을 막을 수 없습니다.

sentences.original_text: Death cannot do that.
Life cannot do that.
Angels cannot do that,
nor can demons do that.
Nothing that happens to us now,
or that will happen in a future time
can do that.
No powerful spirits can do that.
sentences.korean_translation: 강력한 영들도 그렇게 할 수 없습니다.

sentences.original_text: Nothing that is high above the world can do that,
sentences.korean_translation: 세상 위 높은 곳의 어떤 것도 그렇게 할 수 없으며,

sentences.original_text: nor anything that is deep down below the ground.
sentences.korean_translation: 땅 깊은 곳의 어떤 것도 그렇게 할 수 없습니다.

sentences.original_text: Nothing else in the whole universe
sentences.korean_translation: 온 우주의 그 어떤 다른 것도

sentences.original_text: can stop God from loving us.
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님이 우리를 사랑하시는 것을 막을 수 없습니다.

sentences.original_text: Because of our Lord Christ Jesus,
we know how much God loves us.
sentences.korean_translation: 우리는 하나님이 얼마나 우리를 사랑하시는지 알고 있습니다.

sentences.original_text: I am sure of this.
Nothing can stop God from loving us.
sentences.korean_translation: 아무것도 하나님이 우리를 사랑하시는 것을 막을 수 없습니다.

Life cannot do that.

Nothing that happens to us now,

No powerful spirits can do that.
